item.title: The Lettermen - A Summer Place
item.description:
There’s a
Summer Place
Where it may rain
of storm
Yet I’m safe
and warm
For with in
that summer place
Your arms reach
out to me
And my heart
is free
from all care
For it knows
There are no
gloomy skies
When seen through
the eyes of those
who are blessed
with love
And the sweet secret
of a summer place
Is that it’s anywhere
When two people share
All their hopes
All their dreams
All their love
There’s A Summer Place
Where it may rain
of storm
Yet I’m safe
and warm
in your arms
in your arms
in your arms
in your arms
in your arms
in your arms-
